column1: Are you looking to make furniture?
column7: Furniture can be anything from chairs to cabinets; or even shelves

column1: Are you looking to make joinery elements?

#Does the wood require high mechanical resistance?
Does the wood require the ability to be bent into shape?

Does the wood require varnishing?
